TextBlock.Text: WELBAR: Gosh darn it, just when I thought we were onto something.
WELBAR: The stupid vessel went all crazy and sent our escape pod flying into space, when suddenly we teleport and end up here.
IRNA: You know, Welbar, I think we weren't the only escape pod to crash.
IRNA: I may have caught a glimpse of another pod as we were teleporting.
WELBAR: Well gosh digity dangit, I guess we have to-
QUIAX: Hey guys, do you see that?
QUIAX: There! An escape pod crashing on that <color=orange>desert planet</color>!
